name: Talk Cultist
_source: s;Villager Man 5;They sealed the door without me...
s;Villager Man 5;Oh Lachesis, am I truly so unworthy?
s;Villager Man 5;The other followers of Lachesis are inside the shrine.{w}{br}Enoch, her chosen protector, is taking... defensive measures.
s;Simon;Why the change? What are they afraid of?

s;Villager Man 5;People these days take Lachesis's blessings for granted.{w} Those whom she blesses attribute their fortune to their own skill.{w}{br}But those whom she curses seek to desecrate her shrine.{w}{br}So gamblers, heretics, and all sorts of unfortunate people have been causing us trouble.
s;Villager Man 5;But Lachesis will usher me to safety.{w}{br}She may not have given me the same blessings as Enoch, but I believe fortune will guide me to safety.
s;Simon;Wait, what type of blessing does her chosen protector have?

s;Villager Man 5;The currents of fortune flow ever in his favor.{w}{br}If his opponents have a chance of failing, they will fail.{w}{br}If he has any chance of success, no matter how small, he will prevail.
s;Villager Man 5;So you better not try anything.{w}{br}Lachesis and Enoch won't allow it.
